transcript:
Customer: Hello?

(ringing)

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Bolo bolo.

Executive: Good morning Dhananjay Agrawal sir baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Sir abhi woh available nahi hai, dusre kaam mein lage hue hain isliye baat nahi kar payenge abhi. Hai na? Isliye aapko maine message pada tha aapne dhyan nahi diya message pe. Hai na? Okay. Haan abhi 4 baje baad phone karega aapko, theek hai na?

Customer: Haan, theek hai sir. Main ek baar 11 baje ek baar baat kar leta hu, theek hai sir, theek hai.

Executive: 11 baje, nahi nahi 11 baje mat karna aap, 11 baje mat karna aap. Aap kya naam hai? Ek minute. Ek minute tham lo. Utho.

Executive: Hindi mein baat kar lo bhai. Kya kya bol raha hai inko phone karoge? Isliye kab baat karni hai isse? Kab leke aana hai?

Executive: Time change ho.

Executive: Isko ghaseet ke padaane ka hai isko. [inaudible]

Executive: [inaudible]

Executive: Kal dopahar 12 baje aap kya kya woh karna kya hai? Baat karni hai kya karna hai aapko?

Customer: Nahi sir, kal aapne actually kya tha ek senior leader se baat kari hui thi. Aapka jo account person hai, aapne ek feedback diya hai not satisfied ka, theek hai?

Customer: Haan bilkul sahi baat hai bhai sahab, meri baat sun lo aap. Meri baat sun lo aap. Pehle kya naam hai aapka?

Executive: Manish baat kar raha hu sir.

Customer: Manish ji dekho aisa hai, pehle humne woh Surat ka le rakha tha, phir unhone Daman ka de diya. Surat ka le leke nahi diya. Phir woh change kar denge hum, woh change nahi kiya. Ab humare ko inquiry dhanki aati nahi hai aur inquiry aati bhi hai toh matlab kya naam hai woh dikhate kholne jaate hai tab tak woh bola ki woh expire ho gaya. Yeh nirnay aapne jor laga diya. Kya kya Surat ka liya tha aur kya Daman ka ho gaya, thoda sa. Humara dekho aap dekho IndiaMART se hum log jude hue hai aaj mere khayal se 7-8 saal ho gaye mere ko jude humko.

Executive: Haan ji ji, bahut purane sir, bilkul bilkul sir.

Customer: Haan uske baad matlab position yeh rahi ki humse humara Surat chalta hai unhone pata nahi kiske Daman kar Daman daal diya apne aap hi. Pehle Surat chala tha humara, Daman daal diya humara.

Executive: Sir maafi chahunga sir aise jo aap bol rahe ho na apne aap, aisa nahi karte. Aaj ki date mein sir aap bhi dekhte ho agar koi bhi agar aap PAN card ki detail bhi daloge na ya phir kahin bhi agar aise matlab apne account number bhi daloge na IFSC code toh automatically detect kar leta hai.

Customer: Dekho na aap aap Manish ji aap khud dekho na pehle humara kya chalta tha kya chal raha hai woh toh aap khud dekh lo.

Executive: Sir GST mein daal ke dekha na. Sir sir jo GST actually jo address aata hai sir, suniye sir samajhne ki koshish kariyega. Jo aapka GST hai na sir, jo GST ke according jo GST mein address aapka pada hoga na, uske according sir aapka na.

Customer: GST toh arey sir GST humare paas dono jagah ka hai.

Executive: Okay. GST humare paas dono jagah GST humare paas mein. Last time GST kiya tha woh dekho usme kya change kiya hua hai change kaise hua apne aap yeh. Woh dekho aap. Abhi koi inquiry dhanke nahi aati hai aati hai toh nanni chhoti moti inquiry aati hai humare kaam ki nahi hai woh.

Executive: Dono GST mein sir owner aap log same ho dono logo mein? Dono mein same aap hi naam hai?

Customer: Haan, same haan same.

Executive: Toh sir ek baar mujhe sir woh GST kahan pe sir Surat mein aa raha hai? Surat mein aa raha hai kya sir woh? Surat aur Daman sir kya matlab state alag alag ho gaya ho jata hai kya?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Surat aur state matlab ek just mujhe bataiyega sir I am not properly aware. Thoda sa help kariyega. Surat aur Daman mein kya state alag alag ho jata hai kya sir woh puri cheeze?

Executive: Daman Daman Union Territory hai aur Surat jo hai woh Gujarat mein aata hai.

Customer: Achha woh sir isliye state ka problem aa raha hai kya? State ka issue aa jata hai kya?

Executive: Hmm hmm. Theek hai isliye change nahi ho raha hai ki woh aapka yeh problem aa rahi hai. Hai na? Agar aap chahte hai sir toh ek kaam ho sakta hai main solution aapko de sakta hu. Aapki ek service ko na agar jo service aap dekhiye sir agar aap Surat hi properly chah rahe ho do kaam kar lijiye. Do option hai sir. Hai na? Usko otherwise mat lijiyega sir. Kyunki humne bhi mere khayal se aapka purana pehle bhi concern aaya tha ek cheez ke liye. Pehle bhi main aapki call dekh raha hu toh pehle bhi aapne concern kiya tha. Do kaam kar sakte hai. Ek toh sir usme jo aapka Surat ka jaise aapki GST hai na ji Daman wali usme ek address ka amendment kar sakte hai. Ki agar wohin secondary address agar aapka update ho jayega na kisi pe update ho jata hai sir CA se baat karke update ho jata hai instantly. Agar aap secondary address apna business branch address apna update karwa dete hai na toh usi address pe aapko kuch nahi karna padega aur woh change ho jayega sir. Hai na? Woh hum change kara denge. Koi problem nahi hai usme if and but ka koi sawal hi nahi hai sir. Hai na? Dusra sir yeh hai sir minimum aasan sa option ki aap ek kaam kariyega sirf apne CA se bolke ki sir humara GST mein na secondary address update kar dijiye business unit ka jis hisab se aapka Surat ki jo GST hai hi sir toh branch hogi hogi apni business hoga hi hoga toh jo Daman ka address hai Daman wali GST hai na usme update kara lijiye. Woh sir turant aapka ho jayega sir. Hai na? Aur yahan se bhi main aapka instant kara dunga. Daman wale mein Surat add ho jayega aisa bol rahe ho aap?

Executive: Haan Surat bilkul sir, main yahi keh raha hu. Aap simple sa ek kaam kara lijiye seekh kar bhi lete hai sir woh branch address update ho bhi jata hai. Kai kai log toh char char address update karate hai. Bhai unke branch address hote hai sir. Hai na? Toh hum us bihaf pe na aapka secondary address dikha ke agar primary aapka Surat kara denge sir. Dusra sir yeh hai na pehle humara Surat tha pehle humara pehle humara Surat tha pehle humara. Mere khayal se woh GST actually kya tha na sir main bata raha hu woh kya tha. Pehle Surat tha aapka bilkul lekin woh GST change woh state ke change ki wajah se problem aa rahi hai. Software kya karega ab main dusra option aapko batane wala tha. Woh state change hone ki wajah se aapki GST na woh company account nahi le raha hai. Woh kya karega accounts kya keh raha hai agar woh state change hai sir. Sir yeh humne nahi banayi policy. Yeh government ne sir aise audit laga rakha hai aap bhi jante hai sir. Aap samajhte honge agar main GST mein jab se GST aaya hai na sir toh jo bhi bill invoice bhi aap bhi sir business deal karte honge buyer se toh agar jo jitna amount karoge utne hi amount ko aapko invoice deni padti hai utne hi seller aur credit ka dono ka hona chahiye equal sir aap samajhte honge.

Customer: Ji ji Manish ji koi baat nahi main baat bahut si baat karunga CA se main sir main kya bol raha hu humne koi renew humne renew karwaya tha humne kuch change karwaya nahi tha phir yeh apna change kaise ho gaya?

Executive: Sir aisa nahi ho sakta change karaya hoga. Surat ka address mein alag hoga. Surat ke time pe state aur usme state mein different aa jata hai sir. Kyunki woh pehle se hi hai aaj se nahi hai desh aazad ho usse pehle se hi bhai. Koi naya nahi hai. Ji sir dusra sir option aisa hai ki dusra option main bata raha tha ki agar aapko Surat hi chahiye jaise agar aap kehte nahi Manish ji main CA se baat nahi karunga main kuch nahi karaunga.

Customer: Nahi nahi meri baat suno. Nahi nahi nahi nahi mere samne humare paas inquiry jo hai pehle mujhe pata nahi Surat Daman ka fark hai kya fark hai. Yeh toh mujhe aap pehli baat kar rahe ho lekin mujhe inquiry itni gandi inquiry kyun aa rahi hai aap mera record dekho nikal ke kaise inquiry humare paas aa rahi hai. Phir yeh aapne laga rakha hai lead expired likha rakha hai aapne. Yeh first time ko dikha karo pehle kabhi aisa kabhi nahi hua. Humne lead dekhi hai toh uske pehle expired dikha deta hai.

Executive: Bilkul sir. Aap dekho sir aap bahut purane ho. Aap bhi aware ho ki IndiaMART se bahut purana aapne business kara bahut purani deal karte ho. Lekin sir thoda sa mujhe help kariyega ki pehle ka business mein aaj ke pehle pe agar aapki industry mein char supplier the aaj ki date mein chee saal usme 60 supplier ho gaye hai. Cheez kya hai matlab speed se sir business har koi na business acquire kar raha hai. Hai na? Toh competition sir buyer wohi limitation hai lekin supplier badh gaye hai sir. Jahan pe 100 supplier ki 100 buyer ke beech mein sir paanch che supplier the aaj woh 100 matlab 150 ho gaye hai buyer sir. 150 buyer ki jagah wahan pe lekin 60 supplier ho gaye hai. Toh sir competition thoda badh gaya hai toh usme hume active hona padega. Ab us buylead mein jaise aap keh rahe ho na Manish ji mujhe sold out dikhti hai toh sir thoda sa na aapko service pe zyada active hona padega. Aapko apni buylead pe aake daily basis pe aapko activity karni padegi buylead pe purchase karna padega.

Customer: Meri baat suno. Nahi Manish ji meri baat suno. Ab mere pe thop rahe ho sara ka sara. Ab meri baat suno main kya bolna chahta hu.

Executive: Main sahi baat hai. Ab mere pe thop rahe ho ki main kaam nahi kar raha hu ab main yeh lazy aadmi hu yeh bol rahe ho.

Executive: Thopne wali baat meri thopne wali baat nahi hai lekin aapka jo concern hai sir us.

Customer: Haan toh uska uska reply yeh barabar reply jo diya woh reply barabar nahi hai. Main bataunga dekho aapne lead mein notification hai ki lead aayi hai theek hai na. Notification kholte hi dekha aadmi kholne tab toh jaate hai aapke us app pe jaate hai.

Customer: Toh woh saaf ho gaya. Matlab woh notification aane ke saath saath hi woh saaf ho rahi hai yeh baat bol raha hu main aapko.

Executive: Sir koi dikat sir main samajh gaya lekin sir woh jitne baar aap woh notification kholte hai na toh woh lead kis time pe kya woh instant lead dikhti hai kya woh do second pehle matlab sir do second aap dekho na do second kitna time hota hai ek lead ko humne saat logo ko hi dete hai sir hai na agar ek pure all over India mein agar woh lead aayi hogi agar saat log agar usko click kar denge sir toh purchase ho jayegi na sir. Haan aap ek kaam karo na sir main aap bilkul sahi keh rahe ho kahin kahin problem aap face kar rahe honge. Aap ek exercise toh kar lo sir aap mujhe category bata do jis jis product ki aapko lead chahiye hai kuch din mein na Saurabh ko ek ladke ko bolta hu woh aapko lead pe exercise karke aapko help karke dega. Phir jaise hi aapka activity chalu ho jayegi na sir ki aap us particular product mein interest dikhana chalu kar doge toh software automatic aapko sabse pehle uski lead ka frequency aapko bhejega sir.

Customer: Ek kaam kijiye. Manish ji meri baat suniye. Kal ek kaam karte hai. Kal time nishchit karte hai apne. Us time aapke saath main laptop leke baithta hu sari cheeze nishchit karte hai.

Executive: Koi problem nahi sir bilkul aap jis samay phone karenge main sir kis samay aapko phone karu main?

Customer: Dekho aapke mujhe koi concern nahi hai samjhe ki nahi. Mujhe aapki service se concern isliye hai ki main jo paisa hai jab se generate nahi kar pa raha hu main aur main roz matlab ₹100 ka saala woh software leta hu main WhatsApp ka usme mujhe matlab matlab roz ki matlab 10000 20000 kamai hoti hai usse usse khali software chote software se woh woh main kamata hu. Toh aap itni badi company level pe baithe ho aap aapka matlab kya naam all over India world abhi matlab dikha matlab aapka presentation. Toh uske baad phir humare saath aisa ho raha hai batao. Kya matlab hai.

Executive: Koi dikat nahi sir maafi chahunga is cheez ke liye agar problem face kar rahe hai. Kal kis samay call karu main aapse sir kis samay aapke laptop aayenge kis samay aapke saath mein?

Customer: Utho. Ji ae utho. Idhar aa beta.

Executive: Kal ka time final kar lo bhai. Haan sir 12 baje kar lo. Haan sir 12 baje. Kal Manish ji kal 12 baje karte hai apne hai na?

Customer: 12 baje. Hello theek hai sir main 12 baje. 12 baje ka 12 baje ka aap laga do theek hai sir okay. Haan kal 12 baje rakhte hai 12 baje aap jitni bhi query hai hum bhi prepare karke aapke saath mein. Aur main video meeting pe hi aapke saath aata hu video meeting pe hi aata hu sir theek hai sir. Main aata hu aur ladke ko bhi rakhta hu theek hai sir. Theek hai okay ji thank you okay sir thank you. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries are not relevant and often expired.

- Dissatisfied with the change from Surat to Daman.

- Wants to resolve the GST issue.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested updating secondary address in GST.

- Offered to help with lead exercise.

- Agreed to a follow-up video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer and executive will connect next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, location, subscription, inquiries
